Detailed Description

A basic Obj-C wrapper class for the Hot Key functionality that the Pure-C Carbon API provides. Fergus Morrow fergus@enopen.co.uk

Definition at line 16 of file HotKey.h.

Member Function Documentation

- (id) initWithKey: (unsigned short)  key
modifierFlags: (NSUInteger *)  modifier
sender: (id)  sender
callback_id: (int)  callback_id 

Initialises the HotKey instance, and sets up the hot key itself using the Carbon API

Parameters:
key An unsigned short for the keycode for the hotkey
modifier An NSUInteger for the modifier key
sender An object of the caller's type
callback_id An integer to send back to the caller via callback
Returns:
An instance of itself.

Member Data Documentation

- (int*) call_id [protected]

The callback ID to return to the parent class
